about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Our history and mission
about.description: We are a company committed to providing innovative and sustainable solutions. Since our beginnings, we have focused on developing high-quality products that meet the needs of our customers.
about.visionText: To be leaders in the industry, recognized for our excellence, innovation, and commitment to sustainability.
about.missionText: To provide high-quality solutions that improve the lives of our customers, while positively contributing to society and the environment.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyChooseUs.subtitle: Reasons to trust us
whyChooseUs.qualityText: Our products are manufactured with the best materials and meet the highest quality standards.
whyChooseUs.innovationText: We constantly invest in research and development to offer the most advanced solutions.
whyChooseUs.customerServiceText: Our customer service team is available to help you with everything you need.
whyChooseUs.sustainabilityText: We work to minimize our environmental impact and contribute to a more sustainable future.

process.title: Our Process
process.subtitle: How we work
process.step1Text: We analyze your needs and requirements to fully understand your project.
process.step2Text: We develop a detailed plan and create preliminary designs for your approval.
process.step3Text: We manufacture the products following strict quality controls.
process.step4Text: We deliver and install the products at your location with professionalism.
process.step5Text: We offer continuous support to ensure your long-term satisfaction.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to help
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.formSuccess: Message sent successfully! We will contact you soon.
contact.formError: There was an error sending your message. Please try again.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
